      • getRotation

        public float getRotation()
        Returns the amount of rotation (from the right-facing 0 degree) direction that the turtle is currently facing A rotation of 0.0 indicates the turtle is pointing directly to the right.
        Returns:
        the number of degrees clockwise (from right-facing) that the turtle is facing

      • progressFullColor

        public void progressFullColor()
        Changes the color to the next color in the colorProgression sequence

      • progressColor

        public void progressColor(int progression)
        Changes the color "towards" the next color in the colorProgression sequence by the given amount. The progression variable represents the difference in RGB values between the start color and end color. For example, if the current color is black (0, 0, 0), and the next color in the progression is bright red (200, 100, 0), and this function is called with the value 900, the resulting color will be (60, 30, 0).
        Parameters:
        progression - the delta of RGB colors to progress
